org.workflowsim

Class WorkflowScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.DatacenterBroker
        • org.workflowsim.WorkflowScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class WorkflowScheduler
extends DatacenterBroker
    WorkflowScheduler represents a scheduler acting on behalf of a user. It hides VM management, as vm creation, sumbission of jobs to this VMs and destruction of VMs.
    Since:
    WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
